meanings.definition: The practice or advocacy of going nude, especially in designated areas.
meanings.sent1: Nudism is popular at the beach during the summer.
meanings.sent2: Some people enjoy nudism as a way to feel free and natural.
meanings.sent3: At the nudism beach, sunscreen is a must-have!
meanings.sent4: In the world of nudism, clothing is considered optional.
meanings.sent5: The documentary showcased the beauty of nudism in nature.

meanings.definition: The belief in or practice of going unclothed for reasons of health or comfort.
meanings.sent1: Nudism can be beneficial for those with skin conditions.
meanings.sent2: She embraced nudism to feel more comfortable in her own skin.
meanings.sent3: The nudism retreat offered yoga classes in the nude.
meanings.sent4: In the winter, nudism enthusiasts opt for indoor activities.
meanings.sent5: The spa promoted nudism as a way to relax and destress.
